message: Let's start with a fair deal.  I'll take 90% and leave you 10%.  Hopefully, we can both be happy with this.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair. We can still both get a good amount of money, and it's a better deal for me than your last offer. What do you say?
I understand you want a bigger share, Bob.  Let's compromise.  I'll take 55% and you can have 45%.  This way, we both get a decent amount, and I don't have to take a further hit from inflation.
